name: adjust_account_balance
description: Adjust an account's balance by creating an adjustment transaction. Use this to set initial balances or reconcile discrepancies. Positive amount = credit (add money), negative = debit (remove money).

account_id.description: ID of the account to adjust (e.g. 'BCA').

amount.description: Adjustment amount in IDR. Positive = add to balance, negative = subtract from balance.

user_id.description: ID of the user making this adjustment.
